channel.title: Javascript on Ethan Nelson - Data Reporter
channel.description: Recent content in Javascript on Ethan Nelson - Data Reporter

item.title: See which U of M Classes Fared Best in Their Course Evaluations
item.description: The data behind University of Minnesota students’ course evaluations has been requested for years, but only recently became publicly available. This scatter plot, which didn’t look entirely great within the confines of the Daily’s CMS, details class evaluations for classes in 2015. Fun fact: Elementary Akkadian was one of the only courses to get a perfect score.

item.title: Where the U of Minn.'s Student Government Candidates Stand
item.description: This is a super-simple way I displayed the University of Minnesota’s student government candidates’ positions on several of the most important issues in 2016. This just uses jQuery to hide and show the candidates’ comments. Click here for the full story.
